title: 192: Not Really a Ghost Story
itunes:title: Not Really a Ghost Story
description: A simple story of a simple homemaker turns in to a not-so-simple tale of the haunted home where Mike lived in 1992, followed by the spontaneous re-telling of the most terrifying night of Mike’s life. A ghost story that’s not really a ghost story, but nevertheless scared Chuck as bad as it did Mike…
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
